info.name: Nocturnal DeviantArt Theme Fork (+ Sta.sh)
info.description: A dark theme for DeviantArt based off of "Nocturnal DeviantArt Theme" by Chloe Chantelle. The original theme needed some work so I made a few edits. Now includes sta.sh
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE: DA is has launched their new "Eclipse" theme. This userstyle is not compatible with Eclipse, only the old site. People have the option to toggle between Eclipse and the old site for now, but eventually when the old site theme is removed, this userstyle will be archived and no longer maintained. 

NOTES
+ This theme is a work in progress.
+ Custom Colors from the original theme doesn't work. 

CHANGE LOG
11/24/18 Fixed Header Bar
10/22/18 Added fixes for Notes.
05/27/18 Stylized Sta.sh. Added fixes for chat, forums, groups, etc.
06/19/18 Added more fixes for groups.
06/28/18 Styled "More Like This" & CORE sections

CREDIT
Original Theme: "Nocturnal DeviantArt Theme" by Chloe Chantelle 
https://userstyles.org/styles/126711/nocturnal-deviantart-theme
https://chloechantelle.deviantart.com
